title: Out of town, bad laptop, high ping, so let's ARAM!!
body:
Hey guys,

Looking to have some fun while I can't queue up for any ranked. 

Come join for some fun ARAM and conversation. 

Room: Riot ThEntropist's game

Password: aram

:D{{champion:55}}

replies.body:
I would be all about it if it wasn't bed time. Just waiting on wife to stop her holiday puzzling. 
  -_-

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 

You're breaking my heart! {{champion:1}} , you're going down a path I just can't follow.
i love aram because all i do is play casters and press buttons ( i have 650 ping constantly)
Hope you find some fun ppl to play with! Sry...
This is irresponsible. Going into a game knowing you'll be a burden to your team. Set an example for the people who don't know any better.

T_T

But but..

That's what I was trying to do!!!!
eh, I guess doing it in a custom isn't the be all and end all

Not to mention that ARAM is probably the most forgivable of game modes for lag and just generally f*king up.

While I won't condone not trying at all, I think that's the game with the least tryharding.

Unless you get a Yasuo *and* a Malphite. Then it gets intense.

Oh god, I'm in the same boat. 

I'm getting on, lets do this.

EDIT: Oh, nvm. You guys got that going quick x3

EDIT EDIT: NEVERMIND WE DID IT

EDIT EDIT EDIT: Also make sure to tick "private game" while searching for the game

Rioter leaves Chicago, complains about ping.

GG Rito
